property.description: Property sheet to hold xml specification for forms

procedure.description: Create an ESX configuration

formalParameter.description: Configuration Name
Url of ESX server
Attempt a connection to ESX to test credentials.

step.description: Create a ESX configuration

procedure.description: Delete an ESX configuration

formalParameter.description: The configuration name

step.description: Delete an ESX configuration

procedure.description: Create a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to be created.
Name of the datastore. Default: Any accessible datastore with free space greater than the disksize specified.
Name of the host.
Name of the datacenter.
Guest operating system identifier (default is 'winXPProGuest').
Capacity of the virtual disk in KB (default is 4096).
Size of virtual machine's memory in MB (default is 256)
Number of virtual processors in a virtual machine (default is 1).
Network name. Default: Any accessible network.
Flag to specify whether or not to connect the device when the virtual machine starts (default is false).
Flag to specify whether or not to power on the created virtual machine(s) (default is false).
Number of virtual machines to create. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Create a virtual machine

procedure.description: Clone a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine whose clone is to be created.
Name of the clone virtual machine which will be created.
Target host for the new virtual machine.
Name of the datastore. Default: Datastore with the most free space.
Number of clones to be created. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to cloned vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Clone a virtual machine

procedure.description: Relocate a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to be relocated.
Name of the datastore. Default: Datastore with the most free space.
Target host for the virtual machine.
Number of virtual machines to be relocated. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Relocate a virtual machine

procedure.description: Cleanup a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to cleanup.
Number of virtual machines to cleanup. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
If checked, the virtual machine will be destroyed.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Cleanup a virtual machine

procedure.description: Revert a virtual machine to a specified snapshot

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the source virtual machine.
Name of snapshot to revert to.
Power on the virtual machine after being reverted.
Number of virtual machines to revert. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm and snapshot names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Revert a virtual machine to a specified snapshot

procedure.description: Create a snapshot for the specified virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine whose snapshot is to be created.
Name of the snapshot to be created.
Number of virtual machines to snapshot. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm and snapshot names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Create a snapshot for the specified virtual machine

procedure.description: Power on a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to power on.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is '/myJob/ESX/vms').
Flag to specify whether or not to create ElectricCommander resources for the powered on virtual machines (default is false).
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the created resources if created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the created resources should use.
Number of virtual machines to power on. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Power on a virtual machine

procedure.description: Power off a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to power off.
Number of virtual machines to power off. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Power off a virtual machine

procedure.description: Shutdown a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to shut down.
Number of virtual machines to shut down. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Shutdown a virtual machine

procedure.description: Suspend a virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to suspend.
Number of virtual machines to suspend. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Suspend a virtual machine

procedure.description: Store information about a virtual machine and create ElectricCommander resources

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to get the information from.
Number of virtual machines to get the information from. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
The ElectricCommander location to store properties containing information about the virtual machines (default is '/myJob/ESX/vms').
Flag to specify whether or not to create ElectricCommander resources for the virtual machines (default is false).
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the created resources if created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the created resources should use.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Store information about a virtual machine and create ElectricCommander resources

procedure.description: Get virtual machine information and store it in properties

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the virtual machine to get the information from.
Number of virtual machines to get the information from. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
The ElectricCommander location to store properties containing information about the virtual machines (default is '/myJob/ESX/vms').
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Get virtual machine information and store it in properties

procedure.description: Import an OVF package to the ESX server

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the host where virtual machines will be imported.
Name of the datastore to be used.
Name of the virtual machine to import.
Absoulte path to the directory where OVF packages are stored.
Number of virtual machines to import. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to directories and vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Import an OVF package to the ESX server

procedure.description: Export a virtual machine to an OVF package using ovftool

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the host where virtual machine is located.
Name of the datacenter.
Name of the datastore.
Name of the virtual machine to export.
Absoulte path to the directory where virtual machines will be exported.
Number of virtual machines to export. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names (default is 1).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Export a virtual machine to an OVF package using ovftool

procedure.description: Register an existing virtual machine

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Name of the host where virtual machine will be registered.
Name of the datacenter.
Name of the resource pool to register virtual machine.
Datastore path to the virtual machine configuration file (vmx).
Name to be assigned to the virtual machine.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Register an existing virtual machine

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to poweroff vms

formalParameter.description: A list of deployments to stop
The name of an ESX config created from the EC-ESX plugin configuration page.

step.description: Shrink the cloud

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to poweron vms

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
Pattern used to find available machines on the server.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
Number of new servers
Pool name for creating resources

step.description: Grow the cloud

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to sync servers

formalParameter.description: A list of deployments to check
The name of an ESX config created from the EC-ESX plugin configuration page.

step.description: Sync the cloud

procedure.description: List managed-entity type (ClusterComputeResource, ComputeResource, Datacenter, Folder, HostSystem ResourcePool, or VirtualMachine) present on the target VirtualCenter Server or ESX Server system.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

The managed-entity type to be listed (ClusterComputeResource, ComputeResource, Datacenter, Folder, HostSystem ResourcePool, or VirtualMachine) present on the target VirtualCenter Server or ESX Server system.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step

The managed-entity type to be listed (ClusterComputeResource, ComputeResource, Datacenter, Folder, HostSystem ResourcePool, or VirtualMachine) present on the target VirtualCenter Server or ESX Server system.

procedure.description: Create a folder under data center or inside another folder.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.
It can be data center or folder.
The name of the parent in which folder is to be created.
The name of the folder to be created.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Create a folder under data center or inside another folder.

procedure.description: Delete managed-entity type (ClusterComputeResource, ComputeResource, Datacenter, Folder, HostSystem, ResourcePool, or VirtualMachine) present on the target VirtualCenter Server or ESX Server system.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

The managed-entity type to be deleted (ClusterComputeResource, ComputeResource, Datacenter, Folder, HostSystem ResourcePool, or VirtualMachine) present on the target VirtualCenter Server or ESX Server system.
The name of the managed entity to be deleted.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step

The managed-entity type to be deleted (ClusterComputeResource, ComputeResource, Datacenter, Folder, HostSystem ResourcePool, or VirtualMachine) present on the target VirtualCenter Server or ESX Server system.
